header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 6+ years of experience developing scalable data platforms and enterprise applications at Disney, serving 50+ internal teams. Expert in building end-to-end solutions from React frontends to distributed backend systems using modern cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering high-impact projects including schema registries, event-sourced architectures, and automated CI/CD pipelines that reduced manual processes by 90%.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected the Schema Registry providing 50+ teams across Disney with access to data schema management tools including compatibility verification and approval processes
Implemented code-generation for Scala, Java, and Python providing record types and data serialization functions with support for AWS Kinesis, JSON, and Protobuf

Built Infrastructure-as-Code workspaces supporting containerized applications using Terraform and CloudFormation for AWS service provisioning and automated deployment pipelines, reducing manual configuration by 90%

Built data pipelines using Databricks, Apache Spark, and AWS S3 to process streaming data into Disney's data lake, enabling executive dashboard creation and business intelligence reporting across the organization

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala and Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms and peer-to-peer networking protocols
Built a transaction streaming service with Protobuf APIs using http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB for real-time blockchain data indexing and querying
Designed and implemented RESTful management APIs for node configuration, key management, and transaction processing providing users with full access and control over their blockchain network
Established an end-to-end test suite using Postman with CI/CD integration, providing development teams with API test coverage and end-users with API examples

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed an Angular web application integrating multiple .NET backend microservices for tracking submittals, information requests, and issues, providing a unified dashboard interface for construction teams to manage complex workflows and automated business processes.

Implemented an event-sourced change order management system using Event Store for data storage and a microservice architecture, enabling real-time tracking of project modifications with complete audit trails and business intelligence reporting.
Created interactive data visualizations and performance dashboards that transformed complex project data into accessible business intelligence for architects, project managers, and subcontractors

Designed and deployed data storage schemas and integrations for complex use-cases using database engines including MSSQL, PostgreSQL, object storage, and Redis hosted in Azure to ensure high availability

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Developed an automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define test cases using simple C# code for API and UI interactions
Built a comprehensive API testing framework testing HTTP calls to backend microservices and Selenium-based UI testing using XPath selectors
Executed performance testing including bulk operations and load testing to ensure application responsiveness and scalability
Balanced manual testing responsibilities with automation development, writing and executing test cases for continuous quality assurance
